Description:
Family Charm And A Village Vibe
Hosting many traditional family milestones and offering fond memories for its long standing homeowners, this much treasured two bedroom brick gem also boasts a quiet cul-de-sac locale with village neighbourhood vibe, large block of land approximately 533sqm and excellent renovation/extension opportunities (STCA). Immaculately presented, with original high ornate ceilings, polished timber floorboards, decorative cornices and picture rails, this eternally charming home has a classic floor plan offering inviting entry hall and light filled front lounge with tapestry brick fireplace. Plus, an open plan dining space where large family gatherings and celebrations with friends have been enjoyed over many years. Welcoming modern touches is a retro-style kitchen with gas stove, ample storage and breakfast bar. Comfortable and charming accommodation comprises two spacious bedrooms, one includes built-in-robe. They are well-served by an updated central bathroom, separate laundry and toilet. Year round comfort is assured with ducted heating and cooling systems and split-system air conditioner. Features deep backyard with flourishing fruit trees, large steel shed, storage and gated side driveway to front carport. Situated only moments away from thriving Station Street shops, cafés, Fairfield Primary School, playgrounds and Fairfield Station, with excellent proximity to Yarra Bend Park, university and hospital precincts and the CBD.

Positioned on the edge of Northcote's exclusive Sumner Estate, this captivating Californian provides an idyllic inner-urban family lifestyle with its authentic character, contemporary enhancements and delightful outdoor spaces to relax and entertain. Beyond the picket-fenced front garden and its alluring triple-gabled facade, discover a warm and inviting interior comprising three bedrooms (extra-large master) all with built-in robes, together with a stylish bathroom and laundry/powder room (second WC). Enriching its appeal is an elegant central lounge and dedicated dining room leading through to the kitchen/meals area complete with breakfast bar, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other stand-out features include split-system heating and cooling, high ornate ceilings, lead-light windows, plantation shutters and solid timber floors, as well as a study alcove and vast fully-lined attic roof storage (via attic ladder). Rounding out this amazing package is a large al-fresco style entertaining deck overlooking the expansive backyard with lush gardens, established trees and working veggie patches, plus sideway watertank, handy garden shed and secure three-car front off-street parking with remote-control gate. Moments from the open spaces of Merri Park and endless Merri Creek trails, it's also walking distance to Northcote High School, Northcote Primary School, trams (on St Georges Road) and Northcote Station, as well as easy access to High Street shops and cafes. Very impressive!

Description:
Stylish space and breathtaking city views on the banks of the Yarra
Delivering a spectacular panorama of the city skyline, this two-bedroom, two-bathroom, sub-penthouse apartment offers tranquil, indoor-outdoor living amid a vibrant, inner-city position. Perfectly balancing recreation and convenience, the home abuts the verdant walking trails of the Yarra River, while just paces from city-bound trams, Victoria Gardens shopping centre, and the culinary delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road.
Enjoying a true sense of open space rarely found in city-fringe living, the home captures leafy views over the Yarra River by day, and a glittery skyscraper horizon by night. A spacious open plan layout offers room to live and dine, stretching through a wall of floor-to-ceiling windows onto a full-width terrace for unrivalled indoor-outdoor entertaining. At its heart, a chic kitchen caters with ease, providing a full array of Smeg appliances and abundant cabinetry, topped with lustrous stone benchtops.
Both bedrooms are generously sized including extensive built-in robes to each, and a sparkling ensuite to the master bedroom. Completed by a stylish guest bathroom, European laundry, and oodles of storage, the home assures comfort and security with fob-swipe and video intercom entry, split system air-conditioning, two basement carparks, and a storage cage.
Promoting an idyllic river-front lifestyle, a residents courtyard inspires tranquil alfresco dining beside the riverbank, including barbecue facilities and a cosy gas fireplace, while a heated pool and gymnasium encourages home exercise.

Situated in an exclusive Alphington neighbourhood with riverside parkland at the end of the street, this two-level townhouse provides an exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity thanks to its impressive indoor/outdoor space and quality enhancements throughout. Every room bathed in natural light, the home's flawlessly-presented interior comprises two bedrooms (large master) both with built-in robes, together with a stylish ensuite, main central bathroom and guest powder room. Eminently versatile, the open-plan living/dining area is accompanied by a tastefully updated kitchen complete with stone benchtops, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. A premier location walking distance to Coate Park, Yarra Bend Park and endless river trails, it's also close to Fairfield Park Boathouse, Station Street's vibrant shopping village, popular schools, as well as public transport options and easy freeway access.

Next-level luxe with 2 balconies & stunning city views
High-end design quality from award-winning Woods Bagot Architects combines next-level luxury and bespoke brilliance in this state-of-the-art 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment. Founded in craftsmanship in a former furniture warehouse, 'C. F. Row' retains its original 1920s façade and continues the tradition with this stunning contemporary apartment featuring 2 balconies both with outstanding city skyline views. A superbly proportioned, single-level success; security is paramount with video intercom, keyless entry and Paradox alarm system providing peace of mind while sophisticated style is beautifully expressed with white smoked European Oak floors, linear ducted heating/cooling, double-glazed windows/doors, touch lighting, speaker system and custom-built entertainment unit by Melbourne industrial designers, Like Butter. The spacious interior with in situ concrete ceilings offers main bedroom with dual BIRs, large ensuite and study area adjoining a balcony, 2nd bedroom with BIRs, living room with full-height sliding doors to a sensational entertainers' balcony with sweeping views of historic Fitzroy and the city, Miele-equipped Essestone kitchen/meals with recessed LED strip lighting, excellent bathroom and laundry (Vecchio Organic tapware), block-out blinds/drapes plus an external privacy screen, lift access, storage cage and remote-control car space on title. Situated on one of Fitzroy's finest streets with Bentwood cafe below, the city-edge location is outstanding just metres to Brunswick, Smith and Gertrude Streets' myriad restaurants, cafes, shops and city-bound trams.
